Articles.Content: So I'm building a ship semi inspired by star trek. its going to have two engine nescells with each one a cluster of 4 nuclear engines. Now my question is if there is a structural strength difference between fuel tanks and Fuselage? I was originally going to use the fuselage as the pylons to connect the nescells to the main ship but a friend of mine suggested fuel tanks so I can bring more fuel. Oh I suppose I should mention its first mission is to the jool system to study all the moons
This construction advice request moved to the how-to sub-forum, where people with answers can find it, and people with similar questions can learn from it.
